title: 820-3115-B RAM problem
message:
Hi, I have a 820-3115-B board.
It does not registers the RAMs. Sometimes it boots up and works perfectly until I move it or pinch it! As soon as I move it the screen glitches and hangs on me.
It's not the RAMs. I tried different ones. 
Motherboard does not have any sign of liquid damage or corrosions. 
What could be the problem? Where should I look?

Thanks,

title: 820-3115-B RAM problem
message: Try one stick in one slot at a time? If not try with one stick in the top slot then the bottom could be a bad RAM slot

title: 820-3115-B RAM problem
message:
[QUOTE="JohnB8812, post: 30717"]Try one stick in one slot at a time? If not try with one stick in the top slot then the bottom could be a bad RAM slot[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the quick response.
It seems that the slot closer to the keyboard is not working well. Is it fixable?

title: 820-3115-B RAM problem
message: I'll defer to Louis and Duke they say hell no, so I say hell no lol.

title: 820-3115-B RAM problem
message:
[QUOTE="JohnB8812, post: 30719"]I'll defer to Louis and Duke they say hell no, so I say hell no lol.[/QUOTE]

LOL, Thanks anyway.

title: 820-3115-B RAM problem
message: Not fixable, max out the working slot.
